channel.title: CVE Feed for ABB -- PB610 Panel Builder 600
channel.description: The latest CVEs for ABB -- PB610 Panel Builder 600

item.title: CVE-2019-18997|2024-08-05T02:02:39.800Z -- abb -- pb610%20panel%20builder%20600
item.description: The HMISimulator component of ABB PB610 Panel Builder 600 uses the readFile/writeFile interface to manipulate the work file. Path configuration in PB610 HMISimulator versions 2.8.0.424 and earlier potentially allows access to files outside of the working directory, thus potentially supporting unauthorized file access.

item.title: CVE-2019-18995|2024-08-05T02:02:40.045Z -- abb -- pb610%20panel%20builder%20600
item.description: The HMISimulator component of ABB PB610 Panel Builder 600 versions 2.8.0.424 and earlier fails to validate the content-length field for HTTP requests, exposing HMISimulator to denial of service via crafted HTTP requests manipulating the content-length setting.

item.title: CVE-2019-18996|2024-08-05T02:02:39.897Z -- abb -- pb610%20panel%20builder%20600
item.description: Path settings in HMIStudio component of ABB PB610 Panel Builder 600 versions 2.8.0.424 and earlier accept DLLs outside of the program directory, potentially allowing an attacker with access to the local file system the execution of code in the applicationâ€™s context.
